org.gbif.crawler

Interface CrawlListener<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP>

  • Type Parameters:
    CTX - the crawl context this listener supports
    REQ - the type of request this listener supports
    RESP - the type of response (from response handlers) this listener supports
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCrawlListener

    public interface CrawlListener<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP>
    Used to listen for crawl events. Any exceptions thrown are logged but ignored for further processing.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void error(String msg) 
      void error(Throwable e) 
      void finishCrawlAbnormally()
      Reports that the crawl is finished due to an abnormal reason (e.g.
      void finishCrawlNormally()
      Reports that we are done crawling a dataset and there were no errors that lead us to abort it prematurely.
      void finishCrawlOnUserRequest()
      The user requested us to abort the crawl.
      void progress(CTX context)
      Reports that we are making progress.

      Reports the verbatim request as it will be sent to the host.
      void response(RESP response, int retry, long duration, com.google.common.base.Optional<Integer> recordCount, com.google.common.base.Optional<Boolean> endOfRecords)
      Reports a response we received.
      void startCrawl()
      Reports that a Crawler will now actively begin to crawl.

    • Method Detail

      • startCrawl

        void startCrawl()
        Reports that a Crawler will now actively begin to crawl.

      • progress

        void progress(CTX context)
        Reports that we are making progress. This method may be called multiple times with the same context.
        Parameters:
        context - current context the crawler is working on

      • request

        void request(REQ req,
           int retry)
        Reports the verbatim request as it will be sent to the host.
        Parameters:
        req - the request
        retry - we might try a request multiple times if there was a recoverable error, this is the retry number beginning at 1

      • response

        void response(RESP response,
            int retry,
            long duration,
            com.google.common.base.Optional<Integer> recordCount,
            com.google.common.base.Optional<Boolean> endOfRecords)
        Reports a response we received.
        Parameters:
        response - we received
        retry - which retry is this
        duration - how long did it take to receive the response and process it
        recordCount - how many records does the response claim to contain
        endOfRecords - are there more pages coming

      • finishCrawlNormally

        void finishCrawlNormally()
        Reports that we are done crawling a dataset and there were no errors that lead us to abort it prematurely.

      • finishCrawlOnUserRequest

        void finishCrawlOnUserRequest()
        The user requested us to abort the crawl.

      • finishCrawlAbnormally

        void finishCrawlAbnormally()
        Reports that the crawl is finished due to an abnormal reason (e.g. retries exhausted)

      • error

        void error(Throwable e)

      • error

        void error(String msg)
